room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Definitely and adventure, would highly recommend this to anyone for some fun with friends and family. It is really a thought out fun puzzle. I will do this again on a different puzzle. Sign up now for a good time

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We had so much fun in The Apartment! Can't wait to try some of the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We did the apartment and were so very close to getting out. We had so much fun and can't wait to do it again!!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: A super fun time, definitely worth the money. Grab a group of friends and have a enigmatic adventure!

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: My friends and I did The Apartment and had a blast. We are already discussing going back and doing a different room. If your looking for something fun and different to do, this is it.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We were in the 'Apartment' and we did not get out : ( however we were really really close and it was a lot of fun to use our brains and try to figure out the clues. I would definitely recommend giving it a try!

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: My friends and I did "The Apartment." And it was AMAZING!!!! This was the most fun I had in a while. The staff was wonderful. This is a creative idea for an afternoon. I will be talking about this place for a while!!!
